title: MISchool
description: MISchool is a management software system for schools. MISchool enables school to collect, organize, and store records giving your school full control of all academic, finance, wellbeing, and administrative information.

title: IlmExchange
description: Ilm Exchange is a digital education platform that connects schools, teachers and students with affordable resources to enable quality teaching and learning across Pakistan.

title: NAChessHub
description: NA Chess Hub is a website dedicated for chess events publishing and registration in North America. It's a multi-user platform where organizers can publish and manage their events, while chess players can register for published or upcoming events.

title: MondayJobs
description: MondayJobs, an online, recurring job fairs platform, initially started for the Quebec market only. Now in the marketing and planning phase to expand it globally.

title: Factsbook
description: A collection of best, authentic, amazing, interesting, unbelievable, strange, weird and popular facts
